newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: Tuskar names Howard Wolf as chairman.
newsitem.headline: Tuskar names Howard Wolf as chairman.

text.p: Irish oil and gas exploration and production company Tuskar Resources Plc said on Tuesday that it had appointed Howard Wolf as non-executive chairman.
Wolf takes over from Duncan McGregor who has resigned from the board of directors, Tuskar said in a statement.

The appointment of Wolf, a senior partner of international law firm Fulbright & Jaworski LLP, was anticipated last September following a strategic alliance formed with the CAMAC/Allied Energy Group which is now the principal shareholder in Tuskar.
Wolf is also a director of CAMAC International Ltd.
"The appointment of Howard Wolf as chairman marks another important step in the restructuring of Tuskar Resources, managing director Emmet Brown said.
